title: Real Time Chat Application
description: A seamless real-time chat WebSocket-powered application. Created with React and Go, it offers user authentication, account creation, and web chats. Concurrency is managed efficiently with Go routines and mutex locks. With an interactive frontend users can connect and communicate effortlessly.

title: Media Naranja Speed Dating
description: Leveraging Supabase's features, the application ensures safe access control, real-time updates to keep administrators informed and in control. For users, the backend utilizes a matchmaking algorithm to intelligently match individuals, creating pairs with unique session tokens. The entire system is designed with responsiveness in mind, ensuring a seamless experience across various devices.

title: Spotify Playlist Widget
description: This application, built with React in the frontend and Go in the backend, allows users to authenticate with Spotify, view their playlists, and access information about artists, and genres based on their playlists. The backend interacts with both the frontend and the Spotify API, and it includes a SQLite server for storing user sessions.

title: Lucien Bot
description: Discord bot developed in python that demonstrates a simple addition command that can add two numbers or concatenate two strings together, whether they are provided as digits or strings. This showcases how the bot can perform basic calculations. The bot uses the discord.ext.commands framework to handle user-defined commands easily.
